attributes.action: take action against corporate company who fail to fullfil their corporate social responsibililty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government has a role in promoting continuous improvement in the business contribution to the three pillars - economic, social and environmental - of sustainable development. 

The base level of responsible behaviour for any organisation is legal compliance and the Government has a role to play in setting standards in areas such as environmental protection, health & safety and employment rights.
